H0.text: Who released an album entitled The Six Wives of Henry VIII. Keith Emerson

H1.text: Who released an album entitled The Six Wives of Henry VIII. Tony Banks

H2.text: Who released an album entitled The Six Wives of Henry VIII. Jon Lord

H3.text: Who released an album entitled The Six Wives of Henry VIII. Rick Wakeman

A4.text: Wakeman's debut solo album, The Six Wives of Henry VIII, was released in January 1973.

A5.text: He promoted the album with a mimed performance of 'Catherine Howard' on the BBC television show The Old Grey Whistle Test.
